Source.Name: opencl-clang
Source.Summary: A thin, OpenCL-oriented wrapper library around clang
Source.Description: opencl-clang is a thin wrapper library around clang. The library has an OpenCL-oriented API and is capable to compile OpenCL C kernels to SPIR-V modules.
